content: we're insta-stabilizing const generic parameters of const fn when we stabilize min_const_generics. Just a heads up, I don't foresee any problems, but please have a look: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74877/files#r466257941

we had a discussion about this a few months ago because we previously forbid this but weren't able to find a reason why we do so :thinking:

https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/131828-t-compiler/topic/const.20generics.20in.20const.20fn/near/193809394
Not sure if that happened somewhere, but in case it did not: please ping wg-const-eval on all things touching const fn
